attributes.action: Charge foreign drivers tax on entry to uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When we drive in Europe
We pay tolls or have to buy vignettes
Why not charge all none British vehicles 
Tax like in Austria £ 5.00 for 2 days for a car
This would make millions and could reduce the amount of taxes we have to pay on our vehicles
Whats good for Europe is good for us
LETS CHARGE THEM!
